attributes.action: Let Junior Banger Drivers be allowed to race at any track they like!
attributes.additional_details: I find this completely ridiculous! They are children at the end of the day! Our future banger drivers, and they shouldnt be dictated to where they can and cant race! Its bullying at its finest, just to get parents/children to buy licences with them and potentially kill the smaller tracks just to line there pockets, there doing it for the money and not the interest of the children at all! Please sign this if you feel this rule should be withdrawn. Thank you for your time.
attributes.background: So, as you all know, yesterday (25th Feb 19)  Trackstar put up a post about the ‘junior banger association’ telling parents and children that if they race at a non ‘junior banger association track’ they are banned to race at a ‘junior banger association track’

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision would be the responsibility of Trackstar
